author: djencks
msg: Move DefaultInstanceContext to a more public place. Change Exception to Throwable to match Interceptor signature.

author: djencks
msg: Eliminate two threadlocals.  Move more thread specific context information (unshareableResources and applicationManagedSecurityResources) into the InstanceContext.

msg: mx4j-remote was missing from the server dependencies.

author: gdamour
msg: The SUID of a Class equals to 0L if the class is not assignable to
Serializable or if it is a proxy class. Hence it can not be used as a key
of the ObjectStreamClass cache. Use the name of the Class instead.
